title: Happy Father’s Day
author: VD
content_html: A happy Father’s Day to all the fathers out there, particularly my own Dad. Without our mothers, we would not exist; without our fathers, we would not be who we are.
content_text: A happy Father’s Day to all the fathers out there, particularly my own Dad.  Without our mothers, we would not exist; without our fathers, we would not be who we are.
